text: Waitin' on a Sunny Day is a 2003 song by Bruce Springsteen and is the third track from his 12th studio album The Rising. It was not released in the United States but when to number 15 in Sweden, number 27 in Italy and number 20 in Spain. ==References== Category:2003 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Folk rock songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs
title: Waitin' on a Sunny Day
